content: We also had a positive net income of $1.9 million and positive cash flow from operations of $0.9 million for the third quarter of 2022. Licensing, Royalties, Patents and other revenue in the third quarter was $0.7 million compared to $1.5 million in the previous quarter and $2.8 million in the third quarter of 2021. We are pleased to report third quarter positive net income of $1.9 million, or $0.09 per basic share based on 20.2 million basic weighted average shares outstanding. This compares to a GAAP net income of $1.7 million, or $0.08 per basic share in the second quarter of 2022 and net income of $0.9 million, or $0.05 per basic share in the third quarter of 2021. For Q3 2022, adjusted EBITDA improved to $3.4 million compared to $3.3 million in the prior quarter and $2.5 million in Q3 2021.
